Name: Christmas Pudding & Custard Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau Jarana Fino Sherry chilled
30 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
POUR Pedro Ximenez sherry into second smaller glass to be served on the side.
Review: As the name suggests, this drink combines flavours reminiscent of alcoholic custard with Pedro Ximenez sherry resembling liquid Christmas pudding.
History: A Christmas cocktail created in October 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Christmas Pudding & Custard Cocktail contains 233 calories
